DMMO3.SA.summary: Dommo Energia S.A. engages in the exploration and production of oil and natural gas in Brazil. The company holds 100% interest in various exploratory blocks, including BM-C-39, BM-C-40, and BM-C-41 located in the Campos basin. It also owns 40% interest in the BS-4 block located in the Santos basin. The company was formerly known as OGX PetrÃ³leo e GÃ¡s S.A. Dommo Energia S.A. was founded in 2007 and is based in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.
